name: Deteggtive Beaky: A Murder Most Fowl
name_original: Deteggtive Beaky: A Murder Most Fowl
description:
A private eye chicken, Deteggtive Beaky, gets called in to assist in an investigation. A notable bird has died in their own, fairly spooky home, and “fowl” play is suspected. Our feathered friend will need to investigate the scene with his trusty fedora/magnifying glass combo, question suspects, and determine just who is responsible for this crime.

In this game, you play as Deteeggtive Beaky! You must investigate the crime scene by discovering and presenting evidence to NPCs in order to prove your theories.

This game was created by Spencer Hanlon, Nate Pippin, and Amari O'Connor for their Game Lab class at Quinnipiac University.

If Itch is not cooperating, our project is also available to be played here.

Controls:

  • WASD to move around
  • To present evidence, use the UI buttons
  • Object interaction and dialogue are automatically triggered
